name: GRAVITY SMASH BALL
description:
Grab your controls for endless fun of Gravity smash ball.

Gravity tends to be the strongest force act on earth. What we have done is control the force of gravity and tends it to effect on opposite direction. By reversing these phenomena we have launched a new exciting and addictive game play called Gravity Smash Ball. Take control of your smashing ball and move as fast as you can but wait! Be careful about the hurdles, once you hits into hard they will crush your moves and won’t let you move forward and game will be over.

How to Play:
Beat the gravity by moving fast in opposite direction
Break the basic rule of Physics
Accelerate without getting hit into the hurdles
Swipe right and left to make an immersive game play
Dynamic music will help you to enjoy
Unlock new environments by playing wisely
More the score, Highest the position n leaderboard

Beat the force of gravity, Smash your way through a beautiful futuristic dimension 3D environment, smashing obstacles and hurdles in your path, swipe left or right and you’re your sphere for a longer journey run. Let your friends know the break through experience of Gravity smash ball and make your friends to be a part of this Physics based journey.
Gravity Smash ball is going to be the best destructive experience of physics on your IOS devices.
